org.ldaptive.provider.apache

Class ApacheLdapConnection.AbstractApacheLdapSearch

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.ldaptive.provider.apache.ApacheLdapConnection.AbstractApacheLdapSearch
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    ApacheLdapConnection.ApacheLdapSearchIterator, ApacheLdapConnection.ApacheLdapSearchListener
    Enclosing class:
    ApacheLdapConnection

    protected abstract class ApacheLdapConnection.AbstractApacheLdapSearch
extends Object
    Common search functionality for apache ldap iterators and listeners.
